attributes.background: stop the anti-strike legislation being passed. The anti-strike legislation that will see nurses, teacher, firefighters and more key workers sacked if they join the picket line and go on strike. please sign this petition to help key workers have their rights.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Withdraw the Transport Strikes (Minimum Service Levels) Bill: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/627487

Do not introduce laws to restrict strike action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/629486
